mapper.sql:
SELECT D.ID AS DASHBOARD_ID, D.TITLE AS DASHBOARD_TITLE, D.HIDDEN AS DASHBOARD_HIDDEN, D.POSITION AS DASHBOARD_POSITION, D.EDITABLE AS DASHBOARD_EDITABLE, D.SYSTEM AS DASHBOARD_SYSTEM, D.MODIFIED_AT AS DASHBOARD_MODIFIED_AT, D.CREATED_AT AS DASHBOARD_CREATED_AT,
W.ID AS WIDGET_ID, W.TITLE AS WIDGET_TITLE, W.DESCRIPTION AS WIDGET_DESCRIPTION, W.PARAMS_CONFIG AS WIDGET_PARAMS_CONFIG, W.LEGEND_CONFIG AS WIDGET_LEGEND_CONFIG,
WT.ID AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_ID, WT.NAME AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_NAME, WT.DESCRIPTION AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION, WT.TYPE AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_TYPE, WT.SQL AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_SQL, WT.CHART_CONFIG AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_CHART_CONFIG, WT.PARAMS_CONFIG AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_PARAMS_CONFIG, WT.LEGEND_CONFIG AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_LEGEND_CONFIG, WT.MODIFIED_AT AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_MODIFIED_AT, WT.CREATED_AT AS WIDGET_TEMPLATE_CREATED_AT,
W.SQL AS WIDGET_SQL, W.MODEL AS WIDGET_MODEL, W.REFRESHABLE AS WIDGET_REFRESHABLE, W.TYPE AS WIDGET_TYPE, W.MODIFIED_AT AS WIDGET_MODIFIED_AT, W.CREATED_AT AS WIDGET_CREATED_AT, DW.SIZE AS DASHBOARD_WIDGET_SIZE, DW.POSITION AS DASHBOARD_WIDGET_POSITION, DW.LOCATION AS DASHBOARD_WIDGET_LOCATION,
DA.ID AS DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTE_ID, DA.KEY AS DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTE_KEY, DA.VALUE AS DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE FROM DASHBOARDS D LEFT JOIN DASHBOARDS_WIDGETS DW ON D.ID = DW.DASHBOARD_ID LEFT JOIN WIDGETS W ON DW.WIDGET_ID = W.ID LEFT JOIN DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTES DA ON D.ID = DA.DASHBOARD_ID LEFT JOIN management.WIDGET_TEMPLATES WT ON WT.ID = W.WIDGET_TEMPLATE_ID
mapper.select: WHERE D.SYSTEM = FALSE ORDER BY D.POSITION ASC;
WHERE D.HIDDEN = #{hidden} ORDER BY D.POSITION ASC;
WHERE D.TITLE = (SELECT UP.VALUE FROM USER_PREFERENCES UP WHERE UP.NAME = 'DEFAULT_DASHBOARD' AND UP.USER_ID = #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE DASHBOARDS SET TITLE = #{title}, HIDDEN = #{hidden} WHERE ID = #{id} AND SYSTEM = FALSE
UPDATE DASHBOARDS SET POSITION = #{position} WHERE ID = #{id} AND SYSTEM = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DASHBOARDS_WIDGETS (DASHBOARD_ID, WIDGET_ID, SIZE, POSITION, LOCATION) VALUES ( #{dashboardId}, #{widget.id}, #{widget.size}, #{widget.position}, #{widget.location} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DASHBOARDS_WIDGETS WHERE ID = (SELECT ID FROM DASHBOARDS_WIDGETS WHERE DASHBOARD_ID = #{dashboardId} AND WIDGET_ID = #{widgetId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE DASHBOARDS_WIDGETS
SIZE = #{widget.size},
POSITION = #{widget.position},
LOCATION = #{widget.location},
WHERE ID = (SELECT ID FROM DASHBOARDS_WIDGETS WHERE DASHBOARD_ID = #{dashboardId} AND WIDGET_ID = #{widget.id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTES (KEY, VALUE, DASHBOARD_ID) SELECT #{attribute.key}, #{attribute.value}, #{dashboardId} WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT ID FROM DASHBOARDS WHERE ID = #{dashboardId} AND SYSTEM = TRUE )
mapper.sql: SELECT DA.ID AS DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTE_ID, DA.KEY AS DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTE_KEY, DA.VALUE AS DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE FROM DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTES DA LEFT JOIN DASHBOARDS D ON DA.DASHBOARD_ID = D.ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DASHBOARD_ATTRIBUTES WHERE ID = #{id} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT ID FROM DASHBOARDS WHERE ID = #{dashboardId} AND SYSTEM = TRUE )
